attributes.action: Call for the Government to all prosecute all hoax callers to 999 emergency number.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Today the story in the news (14/12/07) about the abuse of emergency service number 999.  Callers were recorded asking petty and frivolous questions where no emergency exists such as the way to HomeBase and the date etc. This is blatant abuse of the service and a disgrace in our society.

We believe the above are indeed hoax callers and they should be prosecuted to discourage this type of behaviour.
